host_about: bem vindos a portugal adoro o meu país mas também adoro conhecer outras culturas e acima de tudo fazer os outros sentirem se felizes adoro receber partilhar experiências gastronómicas culturais e turísticas o facto de para além desta actividade também ser enfermeira faz com que a comunicação e a interajuda sejam os meus pontos fortes ser nosso hospede é sinonimo de ter uma estadia ao encontro dos interesses de cada um e tentarmos dar o nosso melhor para que isso seja proporcionado vivemos na zona há várias décadas por isso conhecedores dos vários pontos de interesse quer do estoril como de lisboa e todas as áreas circundantes marque connosco e volte para o próximo ano com mais amigos helena gonçalves

host_about: as i love to travel i started renting my principe real apartment to other travelers i decorated it entirely for myself with my big canvas and small drawings just like the house where i live and where i entertain my friends i loved it so much that after a few years i had a few more apartments now i manage my apartments together with my brother luis i want travelers to feel at home here and i am grateful for the messages comments and wonderful christmas wishes we continue to receive it s the best recognition you can get when i travel i want to know feel and experience other cultures even if only for a while we are part of a whole and we help each other to grow and i hope enlighten our horizons i am a product of this world i grew up attending a german school but i lived in portugal and it s part of a beach culture with surfing and sports all around me i have traveled extensively to southeast asia and down under as well as throughout europe and brazil and usa ny chicago s francisco hawaii i practice yoga running and hiking and have developed my interests in arts design and architecture i hope that this cultural melting pot that makes each of us will really be shown in my apartment and that it will be a welcoming place for you to come back to after visiting lisbon i hope you enjoy living like a lisboeta and bringing home the best memories health

host_about: angelica lica and zilton are a couple who after having travelled extensively throughout the world have decided to anchor themselves in portugal since angelica managed a small apartment near the beach parede paradise in parede where they would welcome guests from all over the world the experience was eye opening and very rewarding as it opened the door to new opportunities with their hotelier experience angelica is a fine artist and portuguese english teacher who has for a few years now been interested in all organic and natural foods for the betterment of one s quality of life she has also begun her studies as a naturopath and with renewed health and strength has closed the initial project at their apartment in parede and moved onto a bigger more inviting location her guest house called paradise suites will not only offer her guests one of totally renovated and beautifully decorated suites but will also offer breakfast and what angelica likes to refer to as experiences what would these experiences be you ask at paradise suites you can have the opportunity to learn how to cook more balanced meals learn to make oriental art as angélica has received a specialisation and the privilege certification and permission to use the name of the school of her korean art master mr park no ung from the city of busan insouth korea there will also be the opportunity during spring and summer to have yoga classes and chiropractic adjustments at the beginning of april will began work on an organic garden that will allow for the growth of various herbs and vegetables which will be used not only for the preparation of the breakfast but also during the cooking workshops around paradise suites you will find casual coffee shops and restaurants small shops mini markets pharmacies and a hospital several more upscale restaurants lay about min walking distance a couple of large supermarkets within min walk from the house the suites are located in a peaceful and at the same time central area where you can walk a lovely pathway with many herbal and veggies gardens that will take you to carcavelos train station in minutes but only if you don t stop to enjoy the beauty of the different species of birds water streams trees and flowers around your way if you wants to reach carcavelos beac the largest beach in cascais area you will have to walk another minutes beyond the train station to touch the sand if you prefer to take a car or uber the whole journey will take from e minutes at the moment paradise suites is located about minutes away from a the highway that links cascais to lisbon making it a very good location to explore other towns and cities around this area attractive places like lisbon cascais estoril sintra queluz mafra óbidos fátima nazaré and peniche are within minutes driving from the suites it also offers you suites delicious breakfast prepared every morning by angelica herself where she will serve serve you with homemade fruit jam and freshly baked bread the garden that was abandoned for quite a while and now is recovering its beauty allows you to have a relaxing time reading or even take a nap under the trees by our doors you can get buses from and to sintra e oeiras the experiences such as portuguese english classes oriental painting workshops about healthy cooking yoga and a few other activities can be joined by our guests upon pre booking as the dates will be posted in advance we also offer the comfort of a qualified driver doing the transportation from the airport to paradise suites and vice versa you can book for short trips around cascais and lisbon and tours to fatima óbidos and other places of interest while staying here with us we speak portuguese and english

host_about: je suis franco portugaise et j adore le portugal et plus particulièrement lisbonne plusieurs fois par an je me ressource dans mon charmant appartement au calme mais en plein centre ville a chaque fois c est l émerveillement je veux partager tout cela avec vous et souhaite vous faire tomber sous le charme de la capitale portugaise en profitant au mieux de mon pied à terre comment ne pas succomber aux multiples couleurs de la ville et craquer pour ces rues vivantes se rendre à lisbonne c est découvrir une architecture typique une gastronomie savoureuse une hospitalité chaleureuse une ville baignée de soleil et une joie de vivre contagieuse un dépaysement qui j espère vous comblera venez donc poser vos valises chez moi pour votre prochaine expédition j aime tellement lisboa que j y vis depuis quelques années ps fans des bleus je vous accueille avec le plus grand plaisir sans rancune sou francesa de origem portuguesa adoro estar em portugal e principalmente em lisboa tenho hábito de vir recarregar as baterias nesta cidade banhada de sol na quietude do meu apartamento confortável em pleno centro da cidade e sempre que venho fico deslumbrada gostaria de partilhar as maravilhas lisboetas convosco e sobretudo que se apaixonam por elas bem instalados no meu andar tenho a certeza que se vão enamorar das cores vivas de lisboa das ruas cheias de vida e dum sol generoso venham descobrir a sua arquitectura típica a sua gastronomia suculenta a sua hospitalidade a sua alegria contagiosa só poderá ser uma descoberta surpreendente então no vosso próximo passeio sem hesitação venham até lisboa estejam a vontade no meu cantinho e aproveitem o charme lisboeta gosto tanto de lisboa que agora já vivo nesta maravilhosa cidade

host_about: if you re looking for a fun fresh and friendly place to stay then look no further lisboa central hostel is the ideal place for you excellently located in the heart of city in marques de pombal and the famous avenida da liberdade this international hostel provides you with the perfect base for sight seeing by day and partying by night all of lisbon s major hot spots are easily accessible on foot thus saving you the cab fare home at night our friendly local staff will be more than happy to provide you with plenty of information about the city and how to get around ensuring you are able to make the most of your stay in lisbon the hostel is owned and run by a local portuguese family and travellers who are able to offer you a good insight into this magical city as well as some insider s tips on the best places to go and where to eat out here at lisboa central hostel we want you to feel at home and will do our utmost to ensure your stay with us is as pleasant and comfortable as possible in doing this we have created a funky common room complete with tv dvd and playstation facilities including a selection of games we also provide you with a fully equipped kitchen ideal for whipping up tasty meals and from where guests can enjoy our complimentary continental breakfast specially prepared by our masterchef and a picturesque terrace which is ideal for relaxing with a beer on a warm day in short lisboa central hostel is the perfect place for any traveller whether they be the student backpacker the young family or the more mature couple looking for a relaxing stay as well as dorm style rooms the hostel also caters for groups and families looking for private rooms complete with en suite bathrooms the hostel hosts a number of activities and cultural events including weekly film nights and be sure not to miss out on milkshake monday where we will be providing each guest with a free tasty milkshake not to be missed so get yours skates on and book now

host_about: i am the ceo of oh my cod food tours and trips website hidden by airbnb a sustainable travel company that supports local communities and connects travelers with social and cultural subjects in a fun foodie and informative way i was inspired to merge my background in transcultural psychology and anthropology my love for portugal and food with a conscious travel mindset to create impactful and meaningful traveler experiences for other people i believe that every gastronomic tradition can become a unique travel experience slow food travel is one of our inspirations behind every place lie stories gastronomic traditions artisanal tastes and delicious tastings preserved by persons whose identities have been composed over time i was born in lisbon in the oldest district alfama where i spent my childhood always in love with the city which i photographed a lot since adolescence at years old i started to live abroad for voluntary work or research and never stop to travel again but i ve always returned to lisbon i love to travel to meet people to be surprised art is very important to me especially cinema dance and photography website hidden by airbnb but also going out reading cooking eating and drinking with friends and guests i ve lived in france morocco and turkey
